metadata.name: private_markets
metadata.description: Private Prediction Markets with Arcium MPC

docs: Apply batch clear results from Arcium MPC

accounts.name: arcium_authority

docs: Arcium MPC authority (in production, verify signature)

instructions.name: submit_attestation
docs: Submit encrypted attestation for market resolution

instructions.name: update_cfmm_state
docs: Update CFMM state from private trade computation

accounts.name: arcium_authority
docs: Arcium MPC authority (in production, verify signature)

errors.name: InvalidEndTime
errors.msg: Invalid end time (must be in the future)

errors.name: InvalidFeeBps
errors.msg: Fee basis points out of range

errors.name: BatchWindowOpen
errors.msg: Batch clearing window has not ended

types.name: BatchClearOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

fields.name: is_buy
docs: True for buy, false for sell

types.name: ClockAccount
docs: An account storing the current network epoch

types.name: ComputationDefinitionAccount
docs: An account representing a [ComputationDefinition] in a MXE.

types.name: ComputationDefinitionMeta
docs: A computation definition for execution in a MXE.

types.name: ComputationSignature
docs: The signature of a computation defined in a [ComputationDefinition].

types.name: Market
docs: Market state for a prediction market

fields.name: attestation_count
docs: Number of resolvers who have submitted an attestation

fields.name: cfmm_state_commitment
docs: CFMM state commitment (hash of encrypted reserves)

fields.name: batch_order_count
docs: Number of orders in current batch

fields.name: final_outcome
docs: Final outcome (None if unresolved, Some(0) = NO, Some(1) = YES)

types.name: NodeRef
docs: A reference to a node in the cluster.
The offset is to derive the Node Account.
The current_total_rewards is the total rewards the node has received so far in the current

types.name: Output
docs: We currently don't support encrypted outputs yet since encrypted values are passed via

types.name: Parameter
docs: We differentiate between plaintext and encrypted parameters and data objects.
Plaintext parameters are directly provided as their value.
Encrypted parameters are provided as an offchain reference to the data.
Data objects are provided as a reference to the data object account.

types.name: PrivateTradeOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: ResolveMarketOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

fields.name: market
docs: Market this resolver is staking for
